search_query.title: Search Query
search_query.description: Search term(s). Supports OpenAlex boolean/proximity operators.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Key-value pairs for filtering. Keys can include: cited_by_count, doi, fulltext_origin, has_fulltext, indexed_in, institutions_distinct_count, is_paratext, is_retracted, keywords.keyword, language, locations.is_oa, locations.is_accepted, locations.is_published, locations.license, locations.version, locations.source.id, locations.source.type, locations.source.issn, locations.source.is_in_doaj, locations.source.is_core, locations_count, open_access.is_oa, open_access.oa_status, open_access.any_repository_has_fulltext, primary_location.is_oa, primary_location.is_accepted, primary_location.is_published, primary_location.license, primary_location.version, primary_location.source.id, primary_location.source.type, primary_location.source.issn, primary_location.source.is_in_doaj, primary_location.source.is_core, primary_topic.id, primary_topic.subfield.id, primary_topic.field.id, primary_topic.domain.id, publication_year, publication_date, type, type_crossref, abstract.search, authors_count, cited_by, cites, title.search, from_publication_date, to_publication_date, fulltext.search, has_abstract, has_doi, has_oa_accepted_or_published_version, has_oa_submitted_version, has_orcid, has_pmcid, has_pmid, has_references, journal, related_to, repository, title_and_abstract.search, version. Use '|' for OR, '!' for NOT. See OpenAlex docs for value formats.

search_field.title: Search Field
search_field.description: Field to search within. Possible values: 'title', 'abstract', 'fulltext', 'title_and_abstract', 'default' (searches title, abstract, and fulltext).

select_fields.title: Select Fields
select_fields.description: List of root-level fields to return. Possible values: id, doi, title, display_name, publication_year, publication_date, ids, language, primary_location, authorships, countries_distinct_count, institutions_distinct_count, cited_by_count, biblio, is_retracted, is_paratext, concepts, mesh, primary_topic, topics, keywords, grants, referenced_works, related_works, open_access, counts_by_year, sustainable_development_goals, created_date, updated_date, abstract (provides plaintext), apc_list, apc_paid, best_oa_location, citation_normalized_percentile, cited_by_api_url, corresponding_author_ids, corresponding_institution_ids, fulltext_origin, fwci, has_fulltext, indexed_in, locations, locations_count, type, type_crossref. If omitted, defaults are used.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Field to sort by and direction (e.g., {"cited_by_count": "desc"}). Common sort fields: cited_by_count, publication_date, relevance_score.

summarize_results.title: Summarize Results
summarize_results.description: Condenses results to key fields and the abstract, reducing token usage. Set to false to get more detailed results (potentially all fields if select_fields is not used).

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Cursor for pagination (preferred method). Use '*' for the first page.

work_id.title: Work Id
work_id.description: Identifier for the work (OpenAlex ID URL, DOI URL, PMID URL, MAG ID).

select_fields.description: List of root-level fields to return. Possible values: id, doi, title, display_name, publication_year, publication_date, ids, language, primary_location, authorships, countries_distinct_count, institutions_distinct_count, cited_by_count, biblio, is_retracted, is_paratext, concepts, mesh, primary_topic, topics, keywords, grants, referenced_works, related_works, open_access, counts_by_year, sustainable_development_goals, created_date, updated_date, abstract (provides plaintext), apc_list, apc_paid, best_oa_location, citation_normalized_percentile, cited_by_api_url, corresponding_author_ids, corresponding_institution_ids, fulltext_origin, fwci, has_fulltext, indexed_in, locations, locations_count, type, type_crossref. work_id.title: Work Id
work_id.description: OpenAlex ID of the *citing* work (the one whose references you want).

work_id.title: Work Id
work_id.description: OpenAlex ID of the *cited* work (the one you want to see citations for).

select_fields.title: Select Fields
select_fields.description: List of root-level fields for each citing work. Possible values: id, doi, title, display_name, publication_year, publication_date, ids, language, primary_location, authorships, cited_by_count, biblio, is_retracted, is_paratext, concepts, open_access, type, type_crossref. Default: ["id", "doi", "title"].

summarize_results.title: Summarize Results
summarize_results.description: Condenses results to key fields and the abstract, reducing token usage. Set to false to get more detailed results (potentially default summary fields if select_fields is not used).
